#Text=FIFA World Cup 2018 quarterfinals : France , Belgium beat Uruguay , Brazil
#Text=Monday , July 9 , 2018
#Text=On Friday , France defeated Uruguay 2 – 0 in the FIFA football World Cup quarter-finals and Brazil lost 1 – 2 against Belgium .
#Text=With this defeat only countries from the UEFA Confederation are now remaining in the tournament .
#Text=France vs Uruguay
#Text=France faced Uruguay at the Nizhny Novgorod Stadium .
#Text=The French side had better ball possession .
#Text=Uruguayan striker Edinson Cavani was rested for the match and Luis Suárez faced his FC Barcelona teammate Samuel Umtiti in the quarter-final clash .
#Text=Both the sides had early attempts to open the scoring .
#Text=Uruguay blocked N'Golo Kanté 's 12th-minute attempt for a goal .
#Text=Three minutes later , Kylian Mbappé missed a chance from Olivier Giroud 's pass to put France in the lead .
#Text=In the 19th minute , Paul Pogba also had an attempt for goal but went wide .
#Text=France opened the scoring in the 40th minute when Raphaël Varane scored a header from Antoine Griezmann 's assist .
#Text=Minutes before the half-time , Hugo Lloris saved a shot preventing Uruguay from equalising , and Diego Godín missed a close-range shot .
#Text=The first half ended with France having a one-goal lead .
#Text=In the second half , just after the one-hour mark , Griezmann doubled the lead for France , scoring a goal from outside the penalty area from Corentin Tolisso 's assist .
#Text=In the final ten minutes of the 90-minute play , French side made two substitutions , as Steven N'Zonzi and Ousmane Dembélé replaced Tolisso and Mbappé .
#Text=The match ended 2 – 0 .
#Text=After the match , France 's coach Didier Deschamps said , " We had done something big against Argentina and today we have again raised our level .

#Text=You can see our lack of experience sometimes , but we have so many qualities too .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Uruguayan coach Óscar Tabárez said ,  The boys really gave everything , but France were able to control the match very well .

_	_	_	_

#Text=Brazil 's coach Tite said ,  " I thought it was a great match and we had a lot of it , with plenty of possession and a lot of opportunities .

column1: #Text=But Belgium were more effective in converting their opportunities .
#Text=They have a lot of top players and finished well .
#Text=Thibaut Courtois also made a real difference .
#Text=For all the pain I feel right now , if you like football , you have to watch this game .
#Text=It 's going to give you pleasure . "
